name: Spinning torpedo
description: This Torpedo game sprite rotates as it travels. The pack also includes an animated canon explosion where you can spawn torpedo from in your game. each torpedo is fully animated over 11 hand-drawn frames. As these frames are hand-drawn they are 100 percent vector. The download includes a png keyframes of all the animations. the pngs have been exported to around 500 pixels in length. You can always use the svg file with inkscape or illustrator to re export the animations at any resolution.
